Certificate Requirements: Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the certificate

Complete the following:: MGMT 489 - Seminar on Management in Business (3)
An introductory-level IS or CMSC course
MGMT 410 - Operations and Supply Chain Management (3)
MATH 151 - Calculus and Analytic Geometry I (4)
STAT 350 - Statistics with Applications in the Biological Sciences (4)

or STAT 351 - Applied Statistics for Business and Economics (4) 
or STAT 355 - Introduction to Probability and Statistics for Scientists and Engineers (4)
